meanings.definition: A starchy plant tuber that is one of the most important food crops, cooked and eaten as a vegetable.
meanings.sent1: My mom made delicious mashed potatoes for dinner.
meanings.sent2: I bought some fresh potatoes from the market to make fries.
meanings.sent3: Why did the potato go to the gym? To get mashed!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as comforting as a warm bowl of mashed potatoes.
meanings.sent5: The smell of roasted potatoes filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.sent1: Sweet potatoes are a tasty and nutritious side dish.
meanings.sent2: I prefer sweet potatoes over regular potatoes in my pie.
meanings.sent3: What do you call a sweet potato that sings? A yam rock star!
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as smooth and sweet as a baked sweet potato.
meanings.sent5: The orange color of sweet potatoes brightened up the plate.

meanings.sent1: The farmer harvested the potatoes from the field.
meanings.sent2: Potato plants need plenty of sunlight to grow well.
meanings.sent3: Why did the potato plant break up with the tomato plant? It couldn't find the right roots!
meanings.sent4: The potato plant stood tall in the garden, proud of its tubers.
meanings.sent5: The green leaves of the potato plant danced in the breeze.
